sentences.en: "Sergeant, I should like a word with you," said the newcomer, in a pleasantly-inflected baritone.
sentences.cn: “巡佐，我想和您说句话，”新来的人用悦耳的男中音说道。

sentences.en: A cool breeze made the heat pleasantly bearable.
sentences.cn: 一阵凉风吹来，让炎热的天气变得稍微舒适了一些。

sentences.en: He was pleasantly surprised to discover that he was no longer afraid.
sentences.cn: 让他惊喜的是他发现自己不再害怕了.

sentences.en: I was very angry but was able to keep it in and spoke to him pleasantly.
sentences.cn: 我很生气,但还是控制住了自己,仍和颜悦色地跟他讲话.

sentences.en: She lived pleasantly to the age of ninety - two.

sentences.cn: 海滩上人不多，很是惬意。

sentences.en: The spring breeze is pleasantly warm.
The white flowers are pleasantly scented.
The young singer was pleasantly surprised when waves of cheering broke over her at the end of her first performance.
sentences.cn: 那位年轻歌手首场演出结束时,台下响起了雷鸣般的喝彩声,使她又惊又喜.

sentences.en: Their lazy, blurred voices fell pleasantly on his ears.
sentences.cn: 他们那种慢吞吞 、 含糊不清的声音在他听起来却很悦耳.

sentences.en: We talked pleasantly of old times.
sentences.cn: 我们愉快地谈着过去的时光。

sentences.en: We've spent our Easter holidays pleasantly.
sentences.cn: 我们的复活节假期过得很愉快.
